name: devoverflow
description: DevOverflow - A Stack Overflow clone with AI-powered features

scripts.setup: npm run setup:install && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:install: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup:db: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:mobile: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.mobile:android: cd client && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:ios: cd client && npx cap open ios
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
